thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Jean Gaule
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Jean Gaule

author: Jean Gaule
title: Jean Gaule
text: I went to my local store to purchase an item. The particular item was not available in size I wanted in store! The assistant immediately came to my assistance and checked online. He ordered the item & advised I would have delivery within one to two days. I did this on a Sunday afternoon & the item arrived on Monday morning to my home. Excellent service will definitely return
